entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: MoneyTrack: Expense & Budget
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • LifetimeÔºö‚Ç∫899,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫800,00 [‚Ç∫800,00 ~ ‚Ç∫899,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • LifetimeÔºö‚Ç∫800,00
  • AnnualÔºö‚Ç∫299,99
  • MonthlyÔºö‚Ç∫59,99

Application Description

MoneyTrack - Streamlined Personal Finance Tracker Track every penny, master your financial freedom. A pure expense tracking app with no ads, no splash screens, and no investment promotions. ‚ñ† CORE FEATURES ‚Ä¢ Auto-Tracking: Deep integration with Shortcuts allows automatic expense recording triggered by your transactions ‚Ä¢ Comprehensive Entries: Support for income, expenses, reimbursements, transfers, credit card payments, installments, and debt management ‚Ä¢ Insightful Analytics: Visualize spending patterns with pie charts, bar graphs and trend lines to quickly identify financial issues ‚Ä¢ Precise Budgeting: Set annual/monthly budgets for total spending and categories with dynamic daily budget adjustments ‚ñ† COMPLETE ASSET MANAGEMENT ‚Ä¢ Unified management of multiple account types (cash, bank cards, credit cards, store cards) ‚Ä¢ Balance sheet and asset curve for real-time financial status tracking ‚Ä¢ Credit card management system (payment reminders, limit management, interest-free period calculation) ‚Ä¢ Multi-currency asset recording with support for all major currency exchange rates ‚ñ† THOUGHTFUL FUNCTIONS ‚Ä¢ Multiple Ledgers: Flexibly separate different financial records ‚Ä¢ Shared Accounting: Invite family and friends to maintain transparent shared finances ‚Ä¢ Cloud Backup: Free data synchronization across devices with secure protection ‚Ä¢ Flexible Import/Export: Support for importing data from multiple platforms and exporting in Excel format ‚Ä¢ Recurring Entries: Customisable automatic entry tasks that generate transactions on schedule ‚Ä¢ Installment Tracking: Easily monitor payment schedules and receive timely reminders ‚Ä¢ Sub-Categories: Unlimited categorisation options to meet personalised needs ‚ñ† CROSS-PLATFORM EXPERIENCE Synchronise across iPhone, iPad and PC with real-time updates, recording every expenditure wherever you are. ‚ñ† FOCUSED ON FINANCE MANAGEMENT We do one thing only ‚Äî help you better manage your personal finances. No investment promotions, no community distractions, just a pure and efficient expense tracking experience.

Application Screenshot

iPad

entry.title: Photo Sticker
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫39,99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ ‚Ç∫39,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

It's similar to a Photo Sticker machine you see in local stores: Purikura, Icue. We have over 300+ cute sticker for you to create your cute pocket photo. News: This app supports iPad natively with full width and height. Features: - Add frames on your photo - Add stickers on the photo - Add your drawing on the photo - Undo function is provided - Add Text on the image - Position your stickers anywhere you like. - Easy and simple to use. Instruction: First open the photo, then zoom in and out so it position the photo correctly, then click Crop Image Icon. After that, the crop image icon is disabled. It will be active when you start to work on a new photo. Great Fun for my friends in: middle school high school college Student + dorm life University Working class people Keyword: Photo Picture Sticker, Purikura

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: where I put it
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫39,99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ ‚Ç∫39,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

A simple cleanup management app that will quickly find your search! Do you have trouble Looking for items? Find your item quickly with "where I put it‚Äù! Build a house, make furniture, assign lockers, and put all your belongings. Books, important collections, hobby tools, children's toys, seasonal clothes, and items of recollections, the app will help you organize all things in the house.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: Eco inc.
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫33,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫9,99 [‚Ç∫9,99 ~ ‚Ç∫33,99]Ôºâ

In-App Purchases

  • Small PackÔºö‚Ç∫19,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫10,00 [‚Ç∫10,00 ~ ‚Ç∫39,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫9,99

In-App Purchases

  • Small PackÔºö‚Ç∫10,00
  • Medium packÔºö‚Ç∫99,99
  • Big packÔºö‚Ç∫229,99

Application Description

A game about positive impact on nature and eco-friendly living. Ecology strategy games where you reconnect with nature and create a green world for future civilizations. Take on the role of a planet protection fund and stabilize its environmental situation. Join the global movement to save the planet Earth! About game ECO inc. Save The Earth: * Take on the role of a planet protection fund and develop environmental initiatives. * Various game mechanics: from resource management to diplomacy. * Complex tasks and unexpected events that will test your strategic thinking. * An opportunity to make a real contribution to saving the planet by raising awareness of environmental issues. *Global Challenges: Climate change, environmental pollution, resource depletion - all these challenges require your solution. Don't let the environmental catastrophe spread like a "plague" across the planet Earth. *Strategic Planning: Develop long-term plans, consider all factors, and make fateful decisions that will determine the future of the Earth. *Economic Development: Manage resources, invest in new technologies and build a green future world. *Volunteering: Send your heroes to help those in need, participate in international projects and fight for a clean planet. * Education: Raise your eco-awareness, study real problems and find ways to solve them. How to play the planet saving game tutorial guide: The player's goal is to stabilize the environmental situation on the entire planet at an early stage. Then, step by step, restore and improve the eco-situation of the Earth. Yeah, it's an epic quest ;) At the end of the game, you will receive statistics on how successful your mission was. Each step leads to different consequences, you will need to take thoughtful and quick actions. Useful information: Green Days: Eco Calendar ‚Äî your personal guide to the planet‚Äôs most important environmental events! Follow Earth Days, Forest Days, Ocean Days, and Biodiversity Days. Plan your eco-actions and help make the world greener! List of Global Green Holidays: February 2 ‚Äî World Wetlands Day March 3 ‚Äî World Wildlife Day March 21 ‚Äî International Day of Forests March 22 ‚Äî World Water Day March 23 ‚Äî World Meteorological Day April 7 ‚Äî World Health Day (eco-focus) April 22 ‚Äî Earth Day May 22 ‚Äî International Day for Biological Diversity June 5 ‚Äî World Environment Day June 8 ‚Äî World Oceans Day June 17 ‚Äî World Day to Combat Desertification and Drought July 28 ‚Äî World Nature Conservation Day September 16 ‚Äî International Day for the Preservation of the Ozone Layer October 4 ‚Äî World Animal Day October 13 ‚Äî International Day for Disaster Risk Reduction November 6 ‚Äî International Day for Preventing the Exploitation of the Environment in War and Armed Conflict December 11 ‚Äî International Mountain Day Join millions of eco heroes around the world and become part of the global movement to save the planet! :)

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Ghost Detector: Haunted Radar
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫39,99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ ‚Ç∫39,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

This app has a simple functionality: detecting the presence of spirits and capturing them. Once captured, it displays the Six Syllable Mantra from Eastern Buddhism as a form of protection and blessing for the user. ‚Ä¢ This application might scare you. ‚Ä¢ All sensors are on one page. ‚Ä¢ A real radar to track anomalies. ‚Ä¢ Highly accurate EMF (Electromagnetic Field) detector. ‚Ä¢ Take photos and detect anomalies within - can be freely turned on or off. ‚Ä¢ More detailed instructions are available in the app; simply touch the ? button to access them. Warning: If you are a very sensitive or easily scared individual, please consider not using this app and turning it off. Do not put yourself in danger while using this app. If you believe you are in danger, please close the app, contact someone for help, and leave the area immediately. Disclaimer: Please remember that we cannot guarantee the accuracy of any ghost detection since the app uses different sensors of the device, and thus it greatly depends on the terminal's precision and quality. Since supernatural activities cannot be scientifically proven, we cannot guarantee that the app communicates with real spirits. The results of this app cannot be scientifically verified.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

  • Lifetime licenseÔºö‚Ç∫4.499,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫1.499,99 [‚Ç∫1.499,99 ~ ‚Ç∫4.499,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • PRO yearly subscriptionÔºö‚Ç∫1.499,99
  • Lifetime licenseÔºö‚Ç∫1.499,99
  • Monthly SubscriptionÔºö‚Ç∫109,99
  • Yearly SubscriptionÔºö‚Ç∫459,99

Application Description

Experience and control your Apple Home in a whole new way with Controller for HomeKit. Our app combines all the familiar HomeKit features with numerous additional enhancements, offering you a user-friendly interface, unparalleled control, and flexibility. * FLOOR PLAN: Create a detailed floor plan of your home using the LiDAR sensor on your iPhone or iPad and control your HomeKit accessories directly through the floor plan. * COMPLEX AUTOMATIONS: Utilize advanced triggers and conditions for custom automations that are perfectly tailored to your needs. * NOTIFICATIONS: Create custom notifications to stay informed about important events in your home. * BACKUPS: Secure your setup and restore it easily when needed. * SMART FOLDERS: Organize your devices and automations effortlessly with smart folders and custom filters. * WORKFLOWS: Optimize your daily routines with workflows that go beyond the capabilities of Apple Home. * SETUP CODES: Securely store your HomeKit and Matter codes in the app, so they are always at hand and never lost. * MAINTENANCE: Keep track of your setup, quickly identifying which batteries need to be replaced, which devices are unreachable, or which automations are broken. * LOGS: Monitor all activities and changes in your smart home. * WIDGETS: Control your devices faster and easier with convenient widgets or quickly jump into your floor plan. Unlock the full potential of your smart home with Controller for HomeKit. Download the app now and experience how simple and intuitive home automation can be. For more information, visit our website: https://www.controllerforhomekit.com Privacy Policy: https://controllerforhomekit.com/privacy-en/ Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫229,99

In-App Purchases

  • BundleÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • Pre registration bundleÔºö‚Ç∫249,99
  • Premium livery bundleÔºö‚Ç∫249,99
  • Game EditorÔºö‚Ç∫249,99
  • Very Large InvestmentÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • Large InvestmentÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • Huge InvestmentÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • InvestmentÔºö‚Ç∫99,99
  • Chairman's PaymentÔºö‚Ç∫249,99

Application Description

MOTORSPORT MANAGER 4: MASTER RACE STRATEGY BUILD YOUR RACING DYNASTY Immerse yourself in the captivating journey of constructing your motorsport empire from the ground up, where every choice holds the key to your success. ASSEMBLE YOUR DREAM TEAM Hand-pick exceptional drivers and engineer a world-class racing powerhouse. Collaborate closely with drivers to secure pole positions and craft pitstop strategies that lead to race domination. REAL-TIME STRATEGY UNFOLDS Experience the adrenaline-pumping action of races in real-time or navigate through intricate strategy screens. Swiftly adapt to ever-changing weather, unexpected crashes, and the emergence of safety cars. UNLEASH VARIETY ON THE TRACK Embark on thrilling GT and Endurance racing adventures across six distinct championships. Immerse yourself in the iconic beauty of Monaco's settings, rendered in breathtaking artistry. DRIVERS TAKE CENTER STAGE Step into the shoes of promising new drivers, delve into their statistics, and cultivate pivotal relationships. Navigate the revamped HQ, seize upgrade opportunities, and master the new part development system for an immersive journey. YOUR JOURNEY, YOUR CHALLENGE Embark on a motorsport odyssey where every choice shapes your destiny. Witness dynamic AI team movements and adjust the difficulty level as the game evolves with you. SEIZE CONTROL, MAKE HISTORY It's your opportunity to rewrite the annals of racing lore and etch your name into the history of motorsport. Motorsport Manager 4 empowers you like never before.

entry.title: 8mm Vintage Camera
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • 8mm ProÔºö‚Ç∫1.799,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫119,99 [‚Ç∫119,99 ~ ‚Ç∫1.799,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫179,99

In-App Purchases

  • 8mm ProÔºö‚Ç∫119,99
  • Silent Film ThemeÔºö‚Ç∫0,00
  • Light Leak ThemeÔºö‚Ç∫0,00
  • Countdown ThemeÔºö‚Ç∫0,00

Application Description

8mm is so realistic it was even used to film scenes in the Oscar-winning documentary Searching for Sugar Man! We have established the de facto standard of real-time retro film emulation. It was featured by Apple in App of the Day, App of the Week, In the Director's Chair, App Store Essentials, etc. 8mm Vintage Camera captures the beauty and magic of old-school vintage movies right through your viewfinder. Dust and scratches, retro colors, flickering, light leaks, and even frame shake, all can be instantly added with a single tap of the finger. SHOOT BOTH PHOTOS AND VIDEOS WITH SOPHISTICATED LIVE EFFECTS ‚Ä¢ Combine effects of film color, halation, dust & scratch, film grain, and softening to create authentic old-school movies ‚Ä¢ Adjust the strength of the effects to achieve your own unique visual style ‚Ä¢ 10 Lenses (frame) effects: Projector, Vignetting, Light Leak, Color Fringing, Super 8, Screen, 16mm, Tube, color negatives of Super 8 and 16mm ‚Ä¢ 21 Retro & Aged Films: 1920, Noir, 60s, 70s, Sakura, XPro, Siena, Pela, Indigo, Tuscan, Two-Color, 2-Strip, 3X, and monochromes ‚Ä¢ Additional 21 filters that emulate real historical films and expired films - available with the 8mm Pro subscription ‚Ä¢ Jitter Button to imitate real 8mm projectors frame shakes ‚Ä¢ Sound Switch to add projector sound for extra authenticity or mute the video for a silent movie effect. ‚Ä¢ Up to 4K 30fps with original unfiltered video recording on newer devices A COMPACT EDITOR FOR MOVIE CREATION - Apply film and frame effects to clips - Trim video, pan & zoom photo - Add a soundtrack from your music library - Choose from 5 unique themes with matching titles, transitions 8MM PRO SUBSCRIPTION - You can subscribe or make a one-time purchase for unlimited access to all current filters and future updates - Start your subscription with a free 7-day trial. Once the trial is over, you‚Äôll be charged an annual subscription fee - Your subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can go to your Settings > Apple ID > Subscriptions to turn auto-renew off

Application Description

Dumb Phone is a minimalist apps launcher designed to help you reduce screen time by keeping your home screen clean and free of notifications. Fully customizable, Dumb Phone lets you select the apps that are most important to you and display them in a simple, minimalistic interface on your home screen. Whether you prefer dark or light mode, this launcher works well with both, allowing you to choose the view that suits you best. Stay focused and simplify your digital life with Dumb Phone.

entry.title: This Is the Police 2
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫54,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫11,99 [‚Ç∫11,99 ~ ‚Ç∫54,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫11,99

Application Description

IMPORTANT DOES NOT support: iPhone 5S, iPad Air, iPad Mini 2 & 3 and iPod Touch Interpret the law as you see fit in This Is the Police 2, sequel to the acclaimed noir drama This Is the Police! Run the sheriff‚Äôs department, manage your cops, investigate, interrogate, and incarcerate. Make tough decisions ‚Äì and try to keep out of prison yourself! ‚Äì in this story-driven mixture of adventure, strategy, and turn-based tactical combat. Is it a simulation? A management game? A tactical challenge? A visual novel? A puzzle? It‚Äôs all of these, and more! Dive into one-of-a-kind -story-driven experience. Welcome to Sharpwood, a cold and harsh border town riven with violence, where no one is completely innocent. Smugglers, gangs, and screaming populists call this town their home. To maintain peace and order, the young sheriff Lilly Reed (Sarah Hamilton) will have to team up with fugitive criminal Jack Boyd (Jon St. John), and pray that her dangerous plan doesn‚Äôt spiral out of control. Take charge of the Sheriff‚Äôs department. Your subordinates aren‚Äôt just some resource; they are living people with their own strengths, weaknesses, fears, and prejudices ‚Äì and you'll have to reckon with all of them in order to survive. Is one of your guys drinking too much? Or always coming up with excuses for not coming to work? Or does he refuse to follow orders? You‚Äôll have to show a steady hand if you want to impose discipline on this department. Engage in tactical combat. During your most dangerous operations, the game will switch to turn-based combat. Gather a team of your finest cops. Carefully study the terrain, adapt your plans, stealthily approach your suspects and use non-lethal weapons and equipment ‚Äì if the situation allows. True, sometimes gunfights are almost impossible to avoid, but be careful: This Is the Police 2 doesn‚Äôt have hit points. A single bullet can cost a cop their life. Become a true detective. Collect evidence, study case materials, interrogate suspects and send the criminals to court. And if the suspect was innocent? Perhaps it's time to find out if any Sharpwood judges can be bought. Thank you for playing ‚ÄòTHIS IS THE POLICE 2‚Äô! Turn Your Apple Watch into a Sound Effect Generator! With this fun and exciting Apple Watch app, you can choose your favorite sound effects and activate them with just a flick of your wrist! Immerse yourself in the world of superheroes‚Äîtransform like Iron Man or Spider-Man, or explore a variety of other thrilling sounds. From realistic gun effects to animal sounds, police sirens, ambulance alarms, and much more, there‚Äôs always something new to discover! Download now and unleash the power of sound‚Äîbring your childhood dreams to life!
